sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: One mother said, For us parents, it's important that the children can enjoy life, that they can leave the house and we also end up living this magic with them.

sentences.sentence: France is steadfast in its fight against Omicron and is confident it can ramp up vaccinations.

sentences.sentence: But the government will impose restrictions ahead of the celebrations of New Year's.

sentences.sentence: French Prime Minister Jean Castex said as for large outdoor gatherings and events, especially on New Year's Eve, the local authorities will forbid gatherings which aren't declared in advance, alcohol consumption on the public highways and will ask cities to renounce organising big outdoor gatherings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ireland has gone one step further and has imposed an 8pm closing time for pubs, restaurants and live events, as well as other indoor venues such as cinemas and theatres.

sentences.sentence: Russia is demanding that no former Soviet states be allowed to join NATO and that the bloc's troops move away from Russia's borders. But analysts say the bloc is very unlikely to agree.

sentences.sentence: Thousands have gathered for peaceful demonstrations in the centre of Barcelona. The reason? A court decision that mandates 25% of all school subjects be taught in Spanish. The region of Catalonia has its own language called Catalan, and the majority of its over 7 million residents speak it and Spanish fluently.

sentences.sentence: They have access to Spanish via the internet, the TV, friends." During Franco's reign, the use of Catalan was prohibited in schools.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Since his death in 1975, there has been a big comeback of the language and it's considered a regional achievement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Many Catalans consider the court ruling an attack on their educational system and their autonomy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: At a two-day Turkey-Africa summit, which opened in Istanbul on Friday, President Erdogan

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: addressed what he described as a great injustice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Africa represents a sixth of the world's population, but it remains unrepresented at the UN Security Council.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The summit is also a business opportunity. Turkey has been deepening defence ties with African countries and has battle-tested drones to sell. Developments in recent years show all of us that allowing the UN five-member countries to designate the whole world's destiny was a mistake.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It is a great injustice that the African continent, with its population of 1.3 billion, is not represented at the UN Security Council. Turkey's footprint in Africa is growing ever bigger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In two decades it has opened 30 more embassies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And its trade volume has gone up nearly five-fold in the same length of time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ankara has developed a military base in Somalia, and Morocco and Tunisia are believed to have taken delivery of Turkish combat drones in September.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He was worshipped by the Romans as the God of the week and a great protector, and now researchers have uncovered the possible location of the Hercules of Cádiz temple, a building thought lost for centuries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Scientists say they have mapped a large ancient building in the Spanish town of Sancti Petri, believed to be the prized temple.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Archaeologist Milagros Alzaga-Garcia said, The documentary sources we have analysed, the archaeological information, together with the images obtained with digital models of the site, lead us to believe that it could

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The temple was first mentioned in classical Greek and Latin sources, such as Strabo and Philostratus of Athens, which described the building on the dockside as a large Phoenician complex that was accessed by crossing two columns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And what scientists have discovered so far indicate that they have solved the long-lost archaeological mystery.
